net.cloud.gfx.sprites

Class SpriteCollectionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.cloud.gfx.sprites.SpriteCollectionFactory

  • public class SpriteCollectionFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple factory class which will create SpriteCollection objects for a SpriteSet. Meant to decouple the creation of the collection from the SpriteSet enum.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SpriteCollectionFactory() 

    • Method Summary

      static SpriteCollection createCollectionByType(SpriteSet set)

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpriteCollectionFactory

    • Method Detail

      • createCollectionByType

        public static SpriteCollection createCollectionByType(SpriteSet set)
                                               throws FileRequestException,
                                                      java.io.IOException
        Create a SpriteCollection based on the desired type. The constructor will surely be passed the size. However, this is determined from the sprite cache file. The constructor will also be passed the parameters defined in the set's object array. These are for the parameters of the specific subclass.
        Parameters:
        set - What set the collection is being created for
        Returns:
        A SpriteCollection to use for the given SpriteSet
        Throws:
        FileRequestException - The sprite set specifies a canonical name with no matching file space
        java.io.IOException - If the sprite set's files could not be read
